parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name of the image repository.

parameters.name: ExtraParam
parameters.description:
The additional parameters of the image repository. The value of this parameter contains the following fields:

*   **namespace**: the namespace
*   **authToken**: the authorization token

parameters.name: NetType
parameters.description:
The network type. Valid values:

*   **1**: Internet
*   **2**: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: PersistenceDay
parameters.description: The number of days during which assets can be retained.

parameters.name: ProtocolType
parameters.description:
The type of the protocol. Valid values:

*   **1**: HTTP
*   **2**: HTTPS

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RegistryHostIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the image repository.

parameters.name: RegistryName
parameters.description: The alias of the image repository.

parameters.name: RegistryType
parameters.description:
The type of the image repository. Valid values:

*   **CI/CD**: Jenkins

parameters.name: RegistryVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the image repository. Default value: -. Valid values:

*   **-**: the default version
*   **V1**: V1.0
*   **V2**: V2.0

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: TransPerHour
parameters.description: The number of images that can be scanned per hour.
